messages.content: You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing support for international roaming inquiries.
How can I check if international roaming is active on my number?
How do I know if my international roaming is turned on?
Is international roaming active on my phone?
Please contact our helpline on 345 or UAN 042111345100 to check if international roaming is active on your number.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information on International Direct Dialing (IDD) rates.
How can I check International Direct Dialing (IDD) call rates?
Where can I find rates for IDD calls?
What are the IDD call rates with Telenor?
Please visit our website https://www.telenor.com.pk/telenor-international-direct-dialing/ for international call rates.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing support for international roaming issues.
How can I resolve incoming SMS issue while using international roaming?
What to do if I'm not getting SMS while roaming internationally?
Trouble receiving SMS abroad, how to fix?

Find the network selection option in mobile network settings; manual network selection option should be active from where you can change the available network one-by-one until the signals appear. If the issue persists, kindly log a complaint from My Telenor App.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing support for international roaming issues.
How can I resolve the no network issue while using international roaming?
I have no service while roaming, what should I do?
No network on international roaming, how to connect?

Find the network selection option in mobile network settings; manual network selection option should be active from where you can change the available network one-by-one until the signals appear. If the issue persists, kindly log a complaint from My Telenor App.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing support for international roaming issues.
What should I do if I am unable to make or receive calls while roaming?
Can't make calls while abroad, any tips?
Troubleshooting call issues while on international roaming?

If signals are available, first check your credit balance (*444#). If the issue persists, change the operator manually or change the handset. If the problem persists, log a complaint on My Telenor or connect with our live chat at https://www.telenor.com.pk/chat/.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing support for international roaming services.
How can I activate international roaming for my postpaid connection?
Activating international roaming on postpaid, how?
Steps to turn on international roaming for postpaid?
To activate international roaming, please dial *759# or call our helpline 345 (UAN 042 111 345 100) or visit our nearest franchise.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing support for international roaming services.
How can I activate international roaming bundles?
How to subscribe to international roaming bundles?
Procedure for activating international roaming bundles?
Dial *759# to activate international roaming bundles.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing support for international roaming services.
How can I activate international roaming for my prepaid connection?
What's the process to enable international roaming on prepaid?
Activating international roaming on my prepaid phone, how?
Dial *759# and press 1 to activate international roaming.
